description.en: Cryptocurrency to support Renewable Energy as will Renewable Energy is energy that is collected from renewable resources. These are naturally replenished on a human timescale, such as sunlight, wind, rain, tides, waves, and geothermal heat.Matrexcoin can be used as payment for Renewable Energy services With plans to expand into other partner platforms as well.And recommendations of partner’s products and services (Renewable energy) Matrexcoin leverages on the Ethereum Blockchain technology using smart contracts to establish secure, private, and trusted communication links between our users.
